full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Project Title:** Coppermine Point Helicopter Pad and Tower Replacement, Algoma, ON

**Tender Number:** PW-23-01022215

**Solicitation Number:** 30003514

**Public Release Date:** January 20, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Scope of Work:**

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) seeks to replace the existing Aid to Navigation Tower (Aid to Navigation Tower) and construct a new wooden helipad at the Coppermine Point site location, Algoma, ON.

**Objective:**

1. Remove and replace the existing Aid to Navigation Tower with a new one provided by the DFO.
2. Construct a new wooden helipad at the site location based on DFO-provided drawings and site review prior to construction.

**Background:**

The existing Aid to Navigation Tower has reached the end of its life cycle and frequently requires repair. The site location is remote and accessibility may be affected by environmental conditions. A new wooden helipad is necessary to ensure consistent access.

**Scope of Contract:**

The contract will include the provision of all labor, materials, and equipment required to:

* Remove and transport the existing Aid to Navigation Tower and demolish and dispose of the existing foundation.
* Install a new concrete foundation as per DFO-provided drawings.
* Install a new metal tower provided by the DFO as per Appendix B3.
* Construct a new 18' x 18' wooden helipad as per DFO-provided design in Appendix B3.
* Confirm the site elevation and slope prior to construction.

**Security Requirements:**

No security clearance is required for this project.

**Contract Duration:**

The contract duration will be from the date of award to July 28, 2023.
